name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.accesstime.precision
description:
The access time for HDFS file is precise upto this value. 
               The default value is 1 hour. Setting a value of 0 disables
               access times for HDFS.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining
  connection.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.num.refill.threads
description:
Number of threads to use for refilling depleted EncryptedKeyVersion
    cache Queues

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-limit
description: The maximum number of arrays allowed for each array length.
